description:
This course is dedicated to all piano students that want to play chords and play popular pieces using them.

Do you want to learn to play chords?

Did you take the first course and you want to keep learning?

Do you want to play piano but you donÂ´t have the time to attend to a music academy?

This course will guide you in the process to learn this kind of chords:

Major Chords

Minor Chords

Diminished Chords

Maj7 Chords

Dom 7 Chords

And you will apply all the chord knowledge playing well known popular pieces.

In this second course you will learn to play chords which roots are black keys

Join this course and start learning today.

.
title: Playing Piano:  Popular Pieces Vol. II
